original_text: The fields that you give to them for their animals must reach 500 metres from the walls of each town.
korean_text: 너희가 레위인에게 줄 성읍들의 들은 성벽에서부터 밖으로 사방 천 규빗이라

sentences.original_text: The fields that you give to them for their animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 동물들을 위해 그들에게 주는 땅은

sentences.original_text: from the walls of each town
